topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55207f4a6368723312eb1300#post_55207f4a6368723312eb1300
So My Mom Sis and Her Husband have been working real hard outside on a project.

Been adding to the house and all, And my Sisters Husband has been putting in A LOt of help, my sister as well.

So My mom wanted to help them out right? 

Well My Step Dad has been Drinking (By the way he's been back for some time now, I just didn't want to say anything cuz up until now everything has been fine) so all of a sudden My mom comes in and he's all acting like she's neglecting him and shit.

She basically tries telling him she has done no such thing, My Mom would never do something like that, she loves him, even after all the shit he's put her through.

But because he's Drunk and fucking stupid he all acts like she's lying to him and shit and acts a *FOOL*.

So because I'm done standing from the side lines I intervene and basically tell him to not disrespect my mother. Because we are done with that shit and because My moms gone through so much shit in her life.

*And basically he's telling me that its none of my business and tells me that this is how relationships are*

The fuck they aint, The fuck they fucking aint.

So basically, If this keeps going I'm kicking his ass out of the house. AGAIN.

So many chances, So fucking many chances and this little shit DOENST LEARN Anything. 

I'm done trying to give him a chance, There is no saving him.

My Mom is going to talk to him when he's sober and get her dad on it and basically tell him if he doesn't stop drinking He can kiss his ass goodbye and back to the street he goes.

This is why I will never Drink, I will never become like him. 

This is terrible.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
